code: const API_URL='http://192.168.1.63:3001/api';async function callAPI(endpoint){let params=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};try{const url=new URL(`${API_URL}${endpoint}`,window.location.origin);Object.keys(params).forEach(key=>url.searchParams.append(key,params[key]));const response=await fetch(url);if(!response.ok){throw new Error(`Error en la petición: ${response.status}`);}return await response.json();}catch(error){console.error('Error al llamar a la API:',error);throw error;}}const API={buscar:params=>callAPI('/buscar',params)};window.API=API;
